text:
Quorum is Hiring!

Software Engineer | Washington, DC | ONSITE | FULL TIME Our engineers work the full stack using tools like React/Redux, Django, PostgreSQL, React Native, and much more. You will be working in an interdisciplinary, teamwork-oriented environment where you will help build the most powerful advocacy platform on the market. https://grnh.se/4fea05fa1

Product Manager | Washington, DC| Full-Time You have experience working with engineers and want to maintain a code-level appreciation of how our product works. If something is broken, you're able to point an engineer in the right direction, but if you just need to change some text, you're comfortable making a minor tweak and submitting a PR now and again. https://grnh.se/a2b3d1641
